thread.title: 6 Leading Psychics Make Predictions for 2016

title: 6 Leading Psychics Make Predictions for 2016
text:
By Stephen Wagner Updated August 31, 2016 . 
The future is a mystery. Based on past and current events we can sometimes make reasonable assumptions about what might occur in the days ahead... but there are always surprises, the unexpected. At the beginning of every year, well-known psychics make their predictions for what's likely to happen over the next 12 months. Here are many predictions for the world, the economy, the weather and environment, politics, science and technology, and celebrities from such seers as LaMont Hamilton, Nikki, Sidney Friedman, Craig Hamilton-Parker, Tana Hoy and even Nostradamus (sort of). Are you ready? LaMont Hamiltion LaMont Hamilton 
LaMont "Monte" Hamilton has been a recognized and respected intuitive spiritual counselor, writer, speaker and educator for 40 years. He is known internationally as one of the top clairvoyants in the world and has multiple formal accredited degrees each in of the fields of Counseling, Business, Psychology and Education. Here's what he sees for 2016 : 
World: Former Attorney General Eric Holder or privacy advocate Edward Snowden will be nominated for the Nobel Peace Prize . Attention to the growing obesity rate will lead many states to start taxing sugar-related products . Assisted suicide will be made legal in some states. Schools will move away from Common-Core and return to the basic three Rs – Reading, (W)Riting, (A)Rithmetic – after a revolt over our broken educational system. The current "no fly" list that airlines use will be deemed as unconstitutional and will be replaced with a smaller Department of Justice criminal Watch List. The Girl Scouts of America will be forced to accept boys in their organization after a protest by a transgender child. A revolt in China will start to brew over wages going into late 2016. 
Economy: A successful start-up company similar to Apple will emerge that will be run by children/teens and will rival most Fortune 500 companies in profits by making toys to selling clothes and creating fascinating products for children. The economy will take a major financial hit when the elections are over and the problem will be handed to the next administration to deal with. The financial stability of the U.S. will be at a severe turning point, with the stock market and financial institutions about to fail. Things will start to unravel considerably by December as the potential for another 2008 crash occurs. Now through 2017, investigations and indictments will be brought against some bankers for the 2007/2008 Wall Street banking collapse . 
Science and technology: A new tech bubble will create many new businesses and opportunities for small start-up companies. An alternative, free internet like WiFi system will be developed, allowing people to create local networks in their neighborhoods. Television networks will continue to see a decline in viewership in favor of alternate sourced news and entertainment. There will be a push for government regulation of robots after someone is seriously injured by one. Driver-less vehicles will be banned in some cities after the first vehicle wreck is reported. A discovery will prove that some dinosaurs were alive at the same time humans were on the earth. Some countries will send their nuclear/biological waste to the moon or other off-Earth places to get rid of it, creating an international outcry from world governments and environmental groups. The first space baby will be created aboard the International Space Station through an IVF procedure. The discovery of an ancient, advanced underground city will stun scientists and rewrite history as we know it, possibly located in the U.S. or Canada. Some ADHD (Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder) illnesses will be reclassified as an allergy. "Smart" air conditioners will be mandated to be energy-efficient with higher thermostat set points to keep people from lowering them below 70 degrees and operating non-stop. Taking skin tissue and cells from animals and mixing with plants will create a new hybrid program of cures for skin disease and childhood illnesses . Robotic (artificial intelligent) playmates for children will be a reality within two years. 
Politics: Marco Rubio will be the Republican front-runner for the 2016 presidential election. Native Americans will successfully reclaiming part of their native territories, or overturning past treaties in Federal Court with the help of President Obama. The U.S. government will provide reparations to surviving family members of documented African-American slaves before President Obama leaves office. President Obama will pardon hundreds, if not thousands of prisoners, felons and death row inmates before he leaves office, creating a firestorm of controversy over the rights of presidential pardons in general for future presidents. 
Weather and environment: Corporate weather modification services will become commonplace, allowing people to order rain or snow for birthday parties, weddings, or special outdoor events. In April, a major earthquake or tsunami will hit the Eastern Indian Ocean. Deadly tornadoes in the Southeastern U.S. in, or around the 15th of April. At least two major typhoons will damage the Philippines and Japan. The drought in California will reveal new archaeological discoveries as water tables drop, exposing caverns and crevasses containing unique treasures. 
Entertainment and celebrities: Some TV shows will promote visibly handicapped people as stars as a way to integrate acceptance of handicapped people as a norm in visual media. Hollywood movies will feature Muslim actors in lead roles or promote a positive image toward them, while banning plots that portray Muslims as terrorists. 
continue reading below our video Highest Paid Male Actors Ever Nikki. Nikki 
In 2015, Nikki -- "Psychic to the Stars" , successfully predicted: the Paris terrorist attack; Justin Trudeau elected Prime Minister of Canada; George Clooney's marriage; the passing of Maureen O'Hara, and B.B. King; Russia's invasion of other countries; and much more. Here's what she sees for 2016: 
World: Terrorist attacks in Tel Aviv, Brazil, Amsterdam (Holland), Antwerp, Istanbul, Moscow, Rome, Chicago, and at a football stadium. A huge crash at a Formula One race, killing spectators. A drone strike at Buckingham Palace. Another attack at the White House in Washington, D.C. Vladimir Putin will be in grave danger. A out of control plunges into Niagara Falls . A past President will die in a plane crash . A helicopter will crash into the Empire State Building. A commercial airliner shot down by a drone attack. People will be building fall-out shelters again. A plane crashes into the Eiffel Tower in Paris. 
Science and technology: Many UFO sightings reported in Hawaii. Treasure will be found in a castle wall in England, going back to King Henry the Eighth. Scientists will discover an ocean plant that fights cancer . A breakthrough in a cure for lung cancer will be found. A huge breakthrough in the cure for Alzheimer's disease . Spaceship landing.
